title: clearlag 清道夫插件怎么设置不扫指定物品
author: 菜菜菜菜菜
txt_content: 我想设置不扫实体矿车

replies.author: dycfish
replies.txt_content:
配置文件里面  以下我自己修改的
remove:
  world-filter:
    - this_world
  broadcast-removal: true
  boat: false
  falling-block: true
  experienceOrb: true
  painting: false
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: false
  primed-tnt: true
  arrow: true
  snowball: true
  fireball: true
  ender-signal: true
  item-filter:
  # - 264
  # - 265
  # - 311
  # - 312
  # - 266
  mobs:
  # - cow
 下面好像还有几个 我都修改了

replies.txt_content: config 找到矿车然后修改false
